about_the_game:
HYPERSOMNIA is a comedic RPG about friends, foes, and eyes. Lots of eyes.

The year is 201-Something (Twenty-One-Something), After the supernatural death of his mother, 15-year-old Ross Cambell is sent into a frenzy researching the paranormal, and after finding a mysterious golden eye and plans of a demonic invasion, Ross sets out to investigate the strange nation of Starling and stop the upcoming invasion.


    •Turn Based Battles with Scrolling HP
    •Mid-battle Ability Swapping to change up your party's roles and dynamic
    •Funky Battle Backs reminiscent of your favorite Motherly JRPG's
    •Fully Original Graphics and Soundtrack
    •And more!

Gameplay:​


Keep your eyes peeled!
Along Ross' adventure, you'll collect several key items that give the user supernatural abilities! These are able to be switched between your party members to change their roles and change your strategies in battles! Want someone with more HP to be your healer? How about someone with higher special attack to be your tank? If you can think it, you can do it!

Act quick while allies last!
HYPERSOMNIA features scrolling HP in battle! If you're quick enough, you can save a party member in a grim situation! But, play with death like its fire and you'll get more than burnt!

Choose your battles!
In HYPERSOMNIA, enemies will appear on the map, and chase the player if close enough! Walk with caution!

Bring a light to a ghost fight!
Some items will grant characters temporary abilities! Got a cig in your inventory? Light it up and throw it at your enemies for a chance to set them ablaze!

See what's happening!
Special attacks will appear as a comic panel above players info! See what your character looks like while whooping some supernatural butt!


We're currently working on a demo! No ETA yet, but we are actively working on it and making progress.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoonish depictions of Blood and Gore.
